description:
If you're looking to supplement your income but can't figure out what is legitimate, then this class is for you! Learn how to identify scams, promote your talents, and find legitimate companies to work for. Whether your need to get out of debt, save for a vacation, or just get food on the table, you'll learn what is available to achieve your goals. 

Section 1: Is it real or a scam?

In this section, you'll learn:

  • The psychology of scamming
  • How to identify work at home jobs from work at home opportunities
  • How to identify and evaluate MLM, Network Marketing and Direct Sales opportunities
  • What affiliate marketing is
  • How to deconstruct marketing methods on sales websites
  • In-person seminars, what they do to try and get your money
  • Common job scams

Section 2: Internet Information Revealed

In this section you'll learn:

  • The basics of getting online
  • The basics of having a website
  • Masking links
  • Pay Per Click marketing and it's relevance in the work at home world
  • Important email information
  • And how to identify a scam using the SCRAM formula, including tracing emails and tracking IP addresses as well as how to report scammers to the proper authorities.

Section 3: Making Money!

  • The difference between being an Independent Contractor and Employee
  • Taxes: sale and income
  • Quick ways to fast cash
  • Selling your stuff 
  • Domestic ideas
  • Creative Gigs
  • Technical Gigs
  • Drop Shipping
  • Investing
  • Market Research
  • Writing Jobs and Blogging
  • Affiliate programs
  • "Get Paid To" companies
  • Micro-gigs
  • Temp agencies
  • Delivery jobs
  • Providing online assistance and virtual assisting
  • Education gigs
  • Health care gigs
  • Translation gigs
  • Transcription gigs
  • Acting gigs
  • Seasonal work
  • Government work
  • Assistance for the disabled.

Bethany Mooradian has taught nearly 300 classes on working from home helping a staggering 9000+ students get started on the path to self-employment. She has never held a traditional job longer than nine months, and has been "Queen of the Random Job" since 1999, working for over 200 companies as an independent contractor. Her work at home advice has appeared in such publications like Good Housekeeping, AOL Jobs, CareerBuilder, ABC News, US News and World Reports among others. 

This course contains nearly 3 hours of video and approximately 116 pages of text.
title: Work at Home...No Scams!
